columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Type of activity that triggered the event
columns.Name: ActionType

columns.Description: User principal name (UPN) of the account
columns.Name: AccountUpn

columns.Description: Information about the workload from which the URL originated from
columns.Name: Workload

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the email from which the URL was clicked
columns.Name: NetworkMessageId

columns.Description: Verdict on whether the URL leads to malware, phishing, or other threats
columns.Name: ThreatTypes

columns.Description: Methods used to detect whether the URL contains or leads to malware, phishing, or other threats
columns.Name: DetectionMethods

columns.Description: IP address assigned to the device during communication
columns.Name: IPAddress

columns.Description: Indicates whether the user was able to click through to the original URL or not
columns.Name: IsClickedThrough

columns.Description: List of URLs in the redirection chain
columns.Name: UrlChain
